articles.description: After three seasons in the TARDIS, Jodie Whittaker might be leaving Doctor Who
articles.content: The one thing that can be said about every single Doctoras in, the Doctor Who Doctoris that they never stick around. Some hang out for longer than others (Paul McGann was technically the Doctor for d… [+2004 chars]
